issue.title: [C++][Compute] Make a subset of compute:: available even if ARROW_COMPUTE=OFF
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13563](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13563). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
functions like Cast and Take are internally useful enough to be included in libarrow.so even if ARROW_COMPUTE=OFF
